articles.author: Jonathan Franklin
articles.title: American Airlines faces a discrimination suit after removing 8 Black men from flight - NPR
articles.description: Neither passenger knew each other, nor were they seated together on the Jan. 5 flight from Phoenix to New York. A lawsuit alleges they were removed from the flight after a complaint about body odor.
articles.content:
Three Black men have filed a lawsuit against American Airlines alleging they were victims of blatant and egregious racial discrimination after being removed from a flight.
In a lawsuit filed in fede… [+5899 chars]

articles.title: BHP pulls out of £39bn mega-merger with rival Anglo American - BBC.com
articles.description: The £39bn mega-merger between the two international mining giants collapses after a frantic back and forth.
articles.content:
Sean Farrington,Mitchell Labiak & Jonathan Josephs
Mining giant BHP has pulled out of its planned takeover of rival Anglo-American in a deal that would have been valued at £38.6bn.
